articles.description: 18-time Grand Slam singles champion Martina Navratilova, 66, has been diagnosed with throat and breast cancer. The legendary player, who was set to commentate at the Australian Open, will begin treatment in January in New York.
articles.content: By India Today Web Desk: Tennis great Martina Navratilova has been diagnosed with throat and breast cancer. The 18-time Grand Slam singles champion is set to begin treatment later in January in New Y… [+1959 chars]

articles.author: Leontxo García
articles.title: Magnus Carlsen: Fifteen world titles and two major problems - EL PAÍS USA
articles.description: The Norwegian champion has renounced defending his classical chess world title and is facing a multi-million dollar lawsuit from Hans Niemann over cheating allegations

articles.author: Umar Farooq
articles.title: Shaheen Afridi resumes rehab with Pakistan team's medical staff in Karachi - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: Haris Rauf, who has been out with a quad injury, will have his fitness assessed before a call on his availability for the ODIs against New Zealand is taken
